option.od: print the help message and exit.
verbose. Log information to the console.
filename of the map format file. If this is omitted the file is read from standard input.

synopsis.p: Convert a map format file to a cnvmap format file.

description.p: Convert a map format file to a cnvmap format file.
The converted file is written to standard output.

example.description: Convert the map format file "20040402.map" to the cnvmap format file "20040402.cnvmap".
